body:
@reyas fck you. Stories like these are not just fiction, it's how creeps groom teenagers into trusting adult figures of authority then assault them.
Literally for example, there's a restaurant chain in my city that frequently hires high schoolers under the guise of job training but has a handful of managers like this who slowly push the limits, sexually harassing, blackmailing, and assaulting these teens. And other staff have been implicated for allowing it to happen and even hiding their sex offender record from upper management.

So fck anyone who says "don't trust strangers", the onus is not on victims.

Even in fiction.

Rape-kun has a point. Men and especially women shouldn't trust strangers so easily. The bitter truth is that most people are pieces of shit and it's way more prudent to just assume everyone is out to get you unless they prove otherwise.
So fucking hot.. fucked her good
i regret knowing this shit exist
